Software Engineer
RESUME
Jitendra Kumar Mishra :- +<PHONE>, <PHONE> :- mishrajitendra410 @ gmail . com CAREER OBJECTIVE:-
To acquire a position into the software and database industry that offers professional growth, being resourceful, innovative and flexible. PROFESSIONAL SYNOPSIS:-

background.
Conversant with .Net Framework 4.0, Dreamweaver and SQL Server 2008.
An effective communicator with excellent interpersonal, logical thinking &
analytical abilities. EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATION:-

Class.

Contribution : Project leader, Analysis and Coding. Description : Airline Reservation System contains airline Schedules, Fare tariffs, passenger reservations and ticket record.
